column5: Na wɔtow ayɛyindwom ma wo dzin

column2: "Wɔ sanku a no do nhoma du
column4: Wɔ nsankutsen do awɔse ndze mu
column7: nam w'edwuma do ama m'enyi agye: Mobɔtow enyigye ndwom wɔ wo nsaano ndwuma mu."

column4: mbrɛ wo ndwuma dua yɛ nwanwa a! W'adwen mu dɔ pii."

column3: onnyim; Nkyii so ɔkwasea nntse iyi ase:"
Na emumuyɛfo nyinara yɛ prɔmprɔm mpo a; Wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn koraa:"
ɔwo ama do dɛ eko n'ambɛn: Wɔdze ngo fofor asera me."

column2: "M'enyiwa so ehu m'apɛdze wɔ m'atamfo do
column3: M'asowa atse m'apɛdze wɔ ndzebɔnyɛfo a wɔsoɛr tsia me no ho."

column2: "Ɔtseneneenyi bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm dɛ abɛdua: Obenyin dɛ Lebanon do nkyindur ndua."
"Hɔn a wɔatsɛw hɔn wɔ EWURADZE ne fie no Wɔbɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn n'abanguado."
"Wɔbɛda ho asow aba wɔ nkɔdaaber mu; Wɔbɛyɛ sufɔɔ na ebun ebun:"
"Dze akyerɛ dɛ EWURADZE tsen; Ɔno nye mo botan
column3: na dza ɔnntsen bi nnyi no mu."
